lines.text: Yeah- maybe we were just really bad at taking his pulse.
Uh... well, give it another go, if you want.
What do you mean, you can't?
I mean... I can't press hard enough to feel a pulse. He's practically made of rock.
The rigor mortis is set in real hard, I guess.
Or... there's some reason <c=#FF00FF>not even his skin is budgin'.</c>
